channel.title: Eldon on Dragons Not Included
channel.description: Recent content in Eldon on Dragons Not Included

item.title: Eldon Aegis
item.description: Eldon Aegis did not join crusades, he was born into them. For the last century the Agegis’s fought the demons of the Worldwound valiantly and young Eldon grew up on the heroic tales of his family. When duty called Eldon bravely marched on sword in hand. He fights to defend the weak from the evil and bring the justice of his goddess to smite the demons. Behold the gang Our friendly group of travelling adventurers is now assembled!
item.content:
Eldon Aegis did not join crusades, he was born into them. For the last century the Agegis’s fought the demons of the Worldwound valiantly and young Eldon grew up on the heroic tales of his family. When duty called Eldon bravely marched on sword in hand. He fights to defend the weak from the evil and bring the justice of his goddess to smite the demons.

Behold the gang

Our friendly group of travelling adventurers is now assembled! Click to view the full size portraits!

item.title: Episode 01: The Beginning of the End
item.description: Listen to the episode on PodBean: The adventure begins with the party attending a holy festival. What could go wrong? Join the crew of the Dragons Not Included podcast as they roll, crit and laugh their way through the Wrath of the Righteous tabletop role playing adventure. Follow us on Social Media: Subscribe to Podcast Facebook Twitter Credits Check out Social Introvert’s Soundcloud Syrinscape Because Epic Games Need Epic Sound Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Crusade - Heavy Industry Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.
item.content:
Listen to the episode on PodBean:

The adventure begins with the party attending a holy festival. What could go wrong?

Join the crew of the Dragons Not Included podcast as they roll, crit and laugh their way through the Wrath of the Righteous tabletop role playing adventure.
